thread.title: A capsule look at the Astros-Royals playoff series
thread.title_full: A capsule look at the Astros-Royals playoff series

title: A capsule look at the Astros-Royals playoff series
text:
> Texas A capsule look at the Astros-Royals playoff series Kansas City Royals starting pitcher Yordano Ventura adjusts his cap during a news conference at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Mo., Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. The Royals face the Houston Astros in Game 1 of the ALDS Thursday in Kansas City. (AP Photo/Orlin Wagner) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
